remarks: The one-sided fundamental theorem of algebra.  A polynomial of degree ` n ` has at most ` n ` roots.  Unlike the real fundamental theorem ~ fta , which is only true in ` CC ` and other algebraically closed fields, this is true in any integral domain.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
